message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $900,000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, your asking price is a bit high for my budget. I would be willing to purchase it for $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your feedback, we are willing to adjust our price to $850,000. We believe this offers a fair compromise while still reflecting the value and quality of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. However, $850,000 is still a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $800,000? That would be a fair deal for both of us.
